evidence: The motion introduces an extra phase term that accumulates over time, and this additional phase is directly proportional to the velocity of the moving spins.

triples.evidence: The basic idea is similar to what we've seen in echo-planar imaging. We start with an alpha pulse that flips the magnetization vector, M, by an angle alpha for slice selection.

concepts.term: integral from zero to tau/2 of gamma times G-x times x of t, d-t

evidence: Inclusion of a bipolar gradient module ... can be used to produce phase contrast angiograms.
